title: LF mates in adelaide
body:
Im looking for mates in the adelaide area that would like to play random matches (not all ranked) together

my ign is StrampY so feel free to message me there or on here

replies.body: im not fussed with what rank you are as i barely play ranked unless im in the mood lol, tho i am looking for people slightly older then 16 more into the 20's area as ive seen a few to much raging from the younger players :)

I'm in ign is Mar3thyu
Rank: S4
Roles: Mid, Top, JG, Can Sup if needed
Chat: Curse
Age: 16
Omg fellow Radelaidean! Yeah sure XD I'll add you next time I log in.
